message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This price reflects its value and gives you a good deal. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $1,300,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,300,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  This price still allows for a fair profit for me, while also acknowledging your budget constraints.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $1,325,000 for your product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between your needs and mine.
